attributes.background: Shaun Donnelly, the creator of freesciencelessons.com has helped thousands and thousands of GCSE students to succeed in their exams. With over 130,000 YouTube subscribers and 27 million views to date, his services in assisting students in the UK is undeniable.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
